channel.title: Music on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in Music on D00k

item.title: Bandcamp Buyin' 2022
item.description: In an attempt to move away from music streaming, every month of 2022 I bought an album on Bandcamp. Some are favourites of mine, others only just released and are new to me. ∙ Follow me on Bandcamp. The List ∘ January: Fool - McGee. ∘ February: Who Really Cares - TV Girl. ∘ March: Invitation to Her's - Her's. ∘ April: DELI DAYDREAMS - Kojaque. ∘ May: Sex & Food - Unknown Mortal Ochestra.
